about.title: What's up?
about.text1: We are KREIG, a gaming clan from northern Germany. We play Arma, Rainbow Six: Siege and anything else we want.
about.subtitle: Why is the website so empty?
about.text2: Mainly because I haven't finished everything, sorry. :p  -- Kevin
